creditline: The James Ford Bell Foundation Endowment for Art Acquisition and the Marguerite S. McNally Endowment for Art Acquisition
medium: Black chalk on fifteen joined pieces of paper, laid down on canvas
provenance: Francesco Giusti (1752-1829), Bologna. Hugo Fleischhauer, Stuttgart, cf. Lugt 1306b (until d. 1930?); by descent to his niece, Erica Dahr, Stuttgart and Oslo; by descent to present owner (until 2024); art market, London, 2024; sold to Mia.
title: Two Female Allegories Representing Fire and Air (Cartoon for a Fresco)
